participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Friendly and open-minded, enjoys engaging in thoughtful conversations.
participant_1.background: Grew up in a small town and moved to the city for college, where she developed a passion for graphic design.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Energetic and somewhat humorous, appreciates light-hearted banter and making new friends.
participant_2.background: Has a background in engineering and enjoys playing video games in his spare time.
